description: Continued fraction for square root of e.
references: T. J. Osler, A proof of the continued fraction expansion of e^(1/M), Amer. Math. Monthly, 113 (No. 1, 2006), 62-66.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..20000
K. Matthews, Finding the continued fraction of e^(l/m)
Index entries for continued fractions for constants
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,2,0,0,-1).
prog: (PARI) contfrac(sqrt(exp(1)))(PARI) { allocatemem(932245000); default(realprecision, 60000); x=contfrac(sqrt(exp(1))); for (n=1, 20001, write("b058281.txt", n-1, " ", x[n])); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, May 01 2009
crossrefs: Cf. A019774 for decimal expansion of sqrt(e).
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Dec 07 2000
extensions: More terms from Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Jul 10 2001
